website_summaries.verdict: Delivers more than just alkalinized water for the purest drinking water right from your countertop or fridge.
pros: 6-stage filter removes chlorine, heavy metals, and other contaminants from water and sets pH to between 8.5 and 10, depending on the source water
Adds calcium, magnesium, and potassium minerals and anti-oxidants
Great for descaling coffee machines where source water is acidic and makes coffee taste better
cons: Most common complaint is about the lid falling off, though others found this pitcher quite easy to pour

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: I received this pitcher in the mail. Cleaned it per the instructions and soaked the filter as instructed for 15 minutes . Poured water through the assembled pitcher and waited another 15 minutes. Ran water through another 2 times and took a reading on my water sample kit after the third time. I have to say I’m impressed. Vial on the left is the alkaline water from the pitcher and the vial on the right is tap water. Looks to be about 8.8 or better on the scale. Happy with the product. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: LWinfield3

customer_reviews.title: Water measure between 9.0 and 10.0!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I don't know if alkaline water has been medically proven yet, but I believe in it. If cancer can't survive in a properly alkalized body, SIGN ME UP! Water come out of my fridge around 7.0 and I used liquid drops to test the water in this pitcher. It measured between 9 and 10, which is amazing. I know people that spent thousands for actual alkalizing machines. I feel like I've outsmarted them with this product!
customer_reviews.author: jport7

customer_reviews.title: my second one !
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a second one for our house down the cape . Cannot live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Ciaramitaro

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy:  lid - falls off when tilted, and reservoir leaks into pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy lid - falls off when tilted. I bought this and the PureGreen. I immediately noticed lower grade construction and returned to buy a 2nd PureGreen which was not available any longer. Found "Naples Natural" which looked just like the PureGreen in hope of same filter cartidges since i already decided to keep the other. Sure enough; identical, probably the same factory. Not sure the PureGreen is the "best" but atr $39 seemed best buy. Also, the EHM seems to filter too fast, which lead me to wonder how well the process worked. Even the simple Brita is much slower
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: High pH. Poorly constructed pitcher.
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher gives me the highest pH of any other pitcher I've used. What I have issues with is the extremely slow filtration. The water takes a very long time to drain through the filter. And secondly, the lid will not stay secure. It's supposed to snap into the water resevior, but you'll find yourself snapping it back on every other day, as it doesn't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: S.S

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Affordable, Superior Alkaline Water Source for Home Frig
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework on the many options for quality, affordable alkaline water source at home. The Ionizing water machines are ridiculously expensive ($1000 + up). This is clean, convenient, and from my research, more effective at actually alkanilizing your body since the minerals get through to your blood stream. $40 for the original startup and $25 every six months for a replacement filter - what a great deal for improved well being and health. My favorite thing about it is how much better my morning coffee tastes using this water. My pH test shows that my local tap water treated with this filter turns the water to a pH of 8.5+.
customer_reviews.author: Fr. Demetri Tsigas

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to pay return shipping, if not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher 's lid is uneven and doesn't fit properly, causing it to leak. Not happy with the fact that I have to pay the return shipping for an item that is defective. The first one I bought from another company leaked also. I tried one more time and got one from Water of Life that I'm happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Filter always clogs up
customer_reviews.text: As others have pointed out, the pitcher has issues pouring water out. For me, the cover sticks and then when it does open, water gushes everywhere. Makes it difficult to fill a water bottle. But the biggest drawback is the filter. It clogs frequently - and by frequently, I mean every time I refill it. If my return window was still open this item, I would return it. Guess I'm stuck with it - may as well order a replacement filter and see if it makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McGraw

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Nice size that does not require that I don't have to change the filter too often. Also the pitchers design allows for it to fit easily in my fridge. I purchased the EHM Ultra Premium Alkaline Water Pitcher about 8 months ago and use it regularly. Despite some reviews the changing the filter and securing the top is easy. Just take your time and press down firmly, avoiding pressing on the flip top. Also make sure to refill the pitcher with enough water so that the filter is covered. The alkaline level is about 8. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I also discovered the way to get the slow or non dripping filter to work. After removing the reservoir with the filter installed and knocking on the side of the reservoir against the filter, it started working perfectly. I have been using the pitcher for 2 or 3 weeks now and it continues to work just fine. As far as the lid falling off when pouring, I just don't take any chances and hold onto the lid as pouring...no big deal. I have been able to now use the very hard and weird tasting water coming out of my faucet and also use a lot less bottled water, which is saving me money too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Water etched the plastic
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough, but I wish this were glass. Within a month, the water etched the plastic. I use it every day and never let water sit in it overnight. This makes me wonder how much plastic is leaching into the "purified" water. I now use it only to purify the water and transfer the alkaline water into a glass pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this pitcher! Drinking alkaline water is definitely the way to go! Whenever I switch back to "regular bottled water" which is not alkaline, I can always feel the difference. My skin is clearer from drinking alkaline water, I do not get sick, and I mentally feel better. For the reviews saying that the lid is defective. It is not true. You have to clip the lid to the reservoir and it stays on with no problem. Also with the filter, just make sure you push it down all the way so the unfiltered water does not drip through the side cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: MY FIRST EVER ALKALINE FILTER PITCHER!
customer_reviews.text: This is Exciting! I have bought alkaline bottled water for years and thought now is this time to do my own. After reading many reviews and googled reviews, not just Amazon's, this was in the top 5!! Yes, the reviewers listed all the pros and cons yet EMH's Ultra II was the most economically priced for what this filter pitcher delivers. *Arrived quickly as promised *Unpacking- all items safely packaged, no damage. *Easy to read instructions included. *No unusual oders *Easy set up *No cloudy water *PH level for first run is good! See my test results. *Customer service is awesome too!! Answered all my questions. NO MORE BOTTLED WATER FOR ME!
customer_reviews.author: Pro Nail Tech

customer_reviews.title: convenient easy to use
customer_reviews.text: the shape of the pitcher is easy to accommodate in the fridge. the handle is also comfortable for all size of hands from kids to adults. the lid is a miner issue but the company is sending a new one. I find the pitcher to be durable and also easy to clean. also it does not get wet on the outside when put on the counter for a few minutes before placing back in fridge. would highly recommend this pitcher. so much nicer then going to the grocery store and filling up gallons of water.
customer_reviews.author: lisa casssesse

customer_reviews.title: Needed a new filter on first time use because the ph level was too low.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like having to call and make a complaint on my first time using my pitcher, because the ph level of my water was 6.78 to 7.0. I needed it to be at least 8.0. I called EHM and was told that I would receive another one within a few days, but after a week, I had to call again. This time I received a new filter within 3 days. I proceeded to set up my pitcher once again as instructed. When I measured the alkaline level this time I received a reading of 8.0 to 8.5. My rating reflects my frustration of having to wait approximately 9 days before be able use my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JEWELSHIN

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't filter all its volume, only less than 1.5L
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher states that you can filter up to 3.5 liters, but the poor design only really filters less than 1.5 liters as the filter is too low At the end of the day you will have a masive pitcher that only filters less than half of its volume
customer_reviews.author: M. P

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Water Pitcher I bought for Great Tasting Water
customer_reviews.text: Read my review for this same item on Feb. 28th. I cannot think of a better product review than buying the 2nd item after having used the 1st item for a month with such positive results. No, I do not need 2 water pitchers: the 2nd one was a gift for my sister. Yes, I liked the pitcher, and did buy 2. However, they advise a free filter with a submitted review which I did for both. They reneged! Said since I bought both pitchers under my name/ same account although 2 weeks apart, I could only get 1 free filter. Does that sound like an honest company? Poor business practice!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JFD

customer_reviews.title: Not only the best water I ever tasted, it's the cleanest to use for my family
customer_reviews.text: I spent way too much money on bottled alkaline water because I got hooked on the taste and the way it makes me feel. I was skeptical that a home water filter pitcher could deliver that same satisfaction I get from the expensive bottled water brands and I'm pleasantly surprised. Now I stay super hydrated all day long without feeling so guilty about the expense and the amount of plastic I had been purchasing. This water is seriously delicious. You can't beat the taste. I also use it for mixing my baby's formula and my humidifier. It prevents the humidifier from building up residue as quickly. The pitcher itself is easy to put together and take apart for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: S Beard

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Lid! UPDATE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so badly to love this product but the reviews were right the lid is horrible. The lid doesn’t snap on tight and keeps falling off, it’s very frustrating. I’m still using it until I find something better to get my alkaline water. Update: Since my initial post the company sent me a new pitcher and I have to give them credit for being proactive. The new pitcher is great and I don’t have any problems with it. I have learned that you have to take your time putting on the lid and lining it up correctly in order to snap it on. Amazing company that cares about their product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Aubin

customer_reviews.title: Ph level is not optimal
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely a decent pitcher. Would I buy it again, or extra filters, no. I know there were complaints about the lid coming off too easy, but it does snap on, no problem there. My disappointment was in the Ph level. My tap water is Ph level 6.0. The water in filtered into the pitcher averaged about 7. I didn’t order extra filters, because I wanted to test drive this one. So, I am now looking to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: F. Heather Taclas

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the quality. Dollar store quality!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The filter monitor broke within the first week along with the flip top lid hinge. Water gets stuck in reservoire and does not filter down. Was quite upset when I seen it offered at a lower price after I purchased mine. Also, the first one I recieved came broken as well and had to exchange which was easy enough. Filter quality is good though so I gave it 2 stars but this pitcher is way over priced!! Will not buy again and it’s unfortunate that I already need a new one after I spent nearly $55 for a cheap piece of plastic pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: b_fly1

customer_reviews.title: Effective way to make water more alkaline
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived promptly and has proven easy to use. My husband has needed to make his diet more alkaline because of a bout with kidney stones which is why we purchased this product. The PH of the water has gone from 6.4 from our water filters to close to 9 which is a great response and we trust, will prevent him from getting more stones. The product is attractive, and easy to use. We would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Dale

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes good- Better absorption
customer_reviews.text: I really like this filter. I can finally feel the water, I feel hydrated instead of thirsty. We have hard water here and every time I drank water it felt like I wasn't getting any! This water filter changes it so I can feel it. And it tastes good instead of strong minerals that are in the well water here. Been feeding it to the pets, my dog had stomach problems that may be linked to the water here too. She drank a whole bowl and wanted more when I gave it to her. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: tekfae

customer_reviews.title: BPA Free
customer_reviews.text: This product has been in use 29 days - July 30 through August 27. Photo is from today - left photo is tap water filtered in a PUR water pitcher. Great filter and love the taste. Right photo is same tap water source filtered in the Ehm Ultra Premium Alkaline water pitcher. Taste is AMAZING and I have no issue with slow filtering. When/If that changes I’ll post an update.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: No Cry Babies
customer_reviews.text: The lid attaches to the internal reservoir, not the pitcher. Then when you pour place a finger on the lid to hold it in place and to avoid spilling a little water. If you can not do that, then return this immediately and instead order a brain.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Quality alkaline water pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my review to 5 stars. EHM reached out to me after my review and offered some improved parts and more. They truly seem to care and want to be responsible suppliers. I purchased this product to replace an alkaline water filter that was dropped and broke. One thing that this unit doesn’t have is a filter timer to remind you to replace the filter. Not a big deal; a nice to have. Setup was fairly easy but pay attention to the instructions for inserting the inner reservoir; it impacts the lid connection to the unit. Flavor of the water is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Good

customer_reviews.title: Can finally drink tap water
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time & in good condition. The unit is easily assembled. I will have to be cautious cleaning as pitcher doesn’t feel as strong as I had hoped. The tap water in my community is heavily chlorinated, have a sensitive taste/smell & this filter has eliminated all foreign odors/taste. Have been using for a week. Will addendum review if warranted
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We used to buy alkaline water for about $1.00 per liter. It just made sense to purchase a pitcher with an alkaline filter. After comparing products I decided to buy this one. It was easy to put together and set up - we had filtered alkaline water within minutes. I like the design and the size. The water tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pitcher. .
customer_reviews.text: I have heard about health benefits from changing to alkaline water but wow once I tried it take it from me you will never go back to regular old full of chemical water. I was paying upwards of $5 a gallon for store bought alkaline and yuck yeah the plastic! This picture made the most delicious tasting water. That’s right water dies have a taste. It saves loads of money and a much healthier way to get this water at home. The pitcher is a perfect size for any fridge. Go ahead use this water for all your drinking needs. Btw made the best coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Magniccari

customer_reviews.title: This pitcher gives great tasting water and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I started using the pitcher late last night and it worked fine. The water tastes great and I feel confident that it will protect me from chemicals in the local tap water. I have multiple sclerosis and I need water and food that are not contaminated with pesticides or other chemicals that trigger MS flare ups. I look forward to see how the effect of having clean, pure, water impacts my health. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Raised our glass water from 7.1 to 9.5
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this oitcher. We did a lot of research firstnand settled in this. We boughta meter to properly measure the alkalinity of this vs. tap and vs. our Brita. The alkalinity measured 9.5! The Brita however kept in some of the key minerals, but this pitcher does raise the alkalinity; which is why we bought it. Flavor is a bit softer than we are used to compared to a Brita, but taste is good :) great purchase and feel nice and hydrated. Noticed less Bloating feeling and more slimmed stomach area after ine weekend of drinking 3-5 large 16oz waters per day.
customer_reviews.author: Tafa

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not stay secure to both components. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Securing the lide to the inner component that holds the filter will work, until you try to pour the filtered water out of the pitcher. The lid does not stay secure to both the inner and outer components. Therefore, if you have water in the inner component, you get both filtered and unfiltered water when you poor. Very poor manufacturing. disappointing, especially in that there are other cheaper version, they cannot be worse than this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriloo

customer_reviews.title: For those who care about their water
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars for this item. I've enjoyed the water thoroughly, specifically, it seems to replenish me after a decent cardio workout. My only dislike with the item is the calcium deposits that emerge from the filter after a week; simply wash your pitcher and rinse the filter to restore it, should this happen to you. I've not checked the PH, but I'm sold on the way I feel after drinking rather than knowing its level. Likely, a permanent fixture in my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK! Filtered water is same ph as my regular tap water: 7.
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for alkaline water for Reflux treatment. After following all directions exactly, installing new filter after following THOSE directions exactly, ph of 7 same as my tap water. RETURNING. Also returning the extra filters I had purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Fran McL

customer_reviews.title: Clean PH Water
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of the Alkaline water pitcher. I have been buying 9.5 and 10 PH level, bottled water for about 5 months. It can get costly. This pitcher is sturdy and was an easy filter set-up. Great for refilling water bottles, Elimenating plastic in the environment. I would like a ph liquid tester, to test the ph level, occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Works VERY well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3.5 Liter, since I have a slightly smaller Frig. Fits perfect in my frig, plus, holds a LOT of water. The lid stays put when I pour, Water tastes incredible. I was actually recommended to this brand since I was diagnosed with melanoma cancer, and my acidity in my body was very high. I have found this has helped to lower the acid in my body, which is now helping with my breathing and oxygen in my blood. I'm not a doctor by far, so just telling you how it is working for me! Highly recommend this pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Justzen

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Made Pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I understand that the water gets very well filtered as it should be. While this Pitcher does its job, it is so cheap made that the inside filter piece keeps falling a part inside the Pitcher. The top lead is awfully made and it has never stayed in place. NEVER. Every time, I get water the whole lead falls a part and it comes water from the sides as well because the inside filter is loose. It means it comes water all over my counter, not just in the cup! It makes a huge mess. I have no clue if I can return as I have been trying to use it already. But, I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Water!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Alkaline water filter the water taste great!! I was looking to purchase a counter Alkaline water sytem, but I am so glad I discovered this product, such ease to test the water, and I know that I have purchased a product that will improve my health 100 fold. Thank you EHM!!
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Quinones-Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this filter! I have acid reflux and can definitely tell this is helping to keep the acid under control. After a few days of drinking it my family noticed we were all being productive, but didn't know why. After so deduction, I realized the only thing we've done differently was the water from this. Nice to see an impact that we were not expecting. Only bad thing about this is I hate the lid as it slides/falls off way to easy. Tempted not to use it as the water still has to go through the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Curtis

customer_reviews.title: filter clogged before 3 gallons
customer_reviews.text: first time used filter clogged before 3 gallons,very weak lid, have to hold every time you use it, very disappointed I will try another pitcher.Along with the pitcher comes a coupon giving a free filter, but if you have to change every 3 gallons, it would be better to give a lifetime filter coupon.I call today 08/05/2019 to costumer service and the clerk told me to take off the filter and shake it up again, this is ridiculous every time the filter clog it I have to do this, and another thing he said if I leave a great comment I would send a new filter, I'm already sending Pitcher back.
customer_reviews.author: GLENE

customer_reviews.title: Filter exhausted after Two Weeks, Top won't Stay On
customer_reviews.text: It seems very bad for the money! Tasty as the store bought! However this product has a manufacture defect: the top will not stay on. I called and the rep admitted that this is a big problem. Very messy when the top falls off every time you try to pour when the pitcher is full. Update after 1 month: The filter was used up after about two weeks. From the beginning, the top would not stay on. This is apiece of junk. I make my own mineral water now and if I want sparkling water, I use my terrific Soda Stream (highly recommended).
customer_reviews.author: Jack Killough

customer_reviews.title: Definitely provides ph levels between 7.5-8.5
customer_reviews.text: Did a test with THINK ALKALINE test liquid and it showed I got 7.5-8.5. Water tastes smooth and good and I've been told by other people as well Holds a decent amount of water, slow to refill, but not super slow either. The main negative thing about it is the lid and handle. The lid has fallen off and it isn't very secure. Pretty frustrating and it has leaked from the handle, though only once. Have had it for 1 month
customer_reviews.author: abelabliss

customer_reviews.title: The design is terrible for starters
customer_reviews.text: Honestly who developed this pitcher??? It leaks, the cover does not stay on, it is bulky, the unfiltered water pours out when using it before the filtered water does. Oh and it only barley reaches 8 ph. disappointing. This part is not a complaint but a warning. And for you older folks out there, if your not strong, don't buy this pitcher. It is heavy when full.
customer_reviews.author: NanBaker

customer_reviews.title: Filters frequently get clogged up
customer_reviews.text: I had to return mine because the filter was clogged and water was barely flowing through to the reservoir. I talked to the manufacturer and they said this commonly happens because of the stones inside. The stones shift and get clustered together, stopping the water flow. This happens often enough that I thought it was not worth having to hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Cifra

customer_reviews.title: Feel alive and energized!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pitcher at the suggestion of a friend and I Love It! Having a refrigerator that has a water filter, not alkaline, I thought it was fine. But when you drink the alkaline water there is No taste. It just feels like you're swallowing liquid, absolutely no taste. We love ours and will never go back to our fridge "filtered" water. We, my husband and I, feel better as well. More energy and not feeling like we need a nap at work. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Whylie

customer_reviews.title: Top doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I loved this water filter at first. I used it for several months and I didn’t have any issues. I did try to call the number for my “free filter” as stated on the flyer that was packed with the water filter, but no one called me back. I did leave a voicemail. After a few months I began to have issues with the top. Now the top is a joke. I have to hold it on when I pour water and after filling I have to put the top back on and it’s never a tight fit. It will loosen very easily. So disappointed. I do not like to spend money on products that don’t last.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Piece of CRAP
customer_reviews.text: Cracked at 31 days of use. Awesome. This thing is a piece of crap. The lid is so hard to put on but yet falls off so easily. I would NOT recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Lid simply does not click on
customer_reviews.text: I read this complaint in a few other reviews and bought it anyway. The cheap plastic lid to this pitcher does not click, but instead just rests loosely on top. This is not a dealbreaker, but for about $40, a major design flaw. Definitely results in me spilling water every single time I fill it up.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: They should sell this for $9
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest pitcher I have ever seen. They could have spent an extra 5 minutes during design and production, to make sure the lid does not come off when you are serving water. It is incredibly cheaply constructed. It does change the PH of the water to between 8 and 9, but the pitcher comes apart if you or your dog takes a good look at it. Do not buy. Returning product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Received this water pitcher today and so far only have great things to say about it. This is not my first Alkaline water pitcher but my old pitcher from another company was very poorly made and basically was falling apart. This water pitcher is made from medical grade plastic and its BPA free. This pitcher is a good size and is comfortable to use. I live in NY and water that was filtered through this filter taste grade. I will recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: oleg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher does not disappoint! Very well made and sturdy! No leakage and using my friend's water tester, it tested at 9.1 alkaline level. I was a tap water girl and now I feel so much better that I am putting healthy water in my body, I'm also giving it to my cat, she lives it too!...This pitcher also came with a coupon for a free filter. Even though this pitcher does not have a built reminder to change the filter, that is when my handy dandy cell phone comes. Bottom line....great tasting water that is great for your health! Strongly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dame

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed with this product. I use the tap water from my faucet expecting to have a refreshing glass of water, instead it just taste like tap water! I'm not sure if it doesn't work or if this product is just a bad product I didn't notice a difference in my water and either does my family! No one wants to drink the water from this pitcher due to terrible taste! Will not buy again! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It does increase the PH levels!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are very happy with this pitcher. Received it in the mail and promptly started using it. We brought some testing strips and compared our older standard pitcher to this one and was pleased to see that there was a bump in the PH level. I can taste the difference and admittedly feel more hydrated. So far so good, I am super excited for this, the pitcher comes with one filter and was packaged securely. All things pertaining to the product details were as stated so I feel validated for picking this product.
customer_reviews.author: Domenique  Chery

customer_reviews.title: Gritty film
customer_reviews.text: Upon replacing the filter in the pitcher this morning (within the appropriate time frame for replacement), while washing the pitcher I noticed a gritty film along the inside surface. This deeply concerns me as this grit likely got into the water and has been consumed by me and my wife. I therefore do not recommend this product. I also noticed that the resulting water does not neutralize stomach acid as effectively as store-bought alkaline waters.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm E. Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are I’ll fitted. And the top is always coming loose. You have to hold the lid tight I order to avoid water from spilling every where
customer_reviews.author: GIGI86

customer_reviews.title: Wow - makes my tap water taste cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the taste of my first glass of water from the EHM pitcher. But with the second glass I did a side by side taste test with my old Mavea pitcher (which wasn't an alkaline water pitcher) and I was blown away by the difference. The Mavea water tasted kind of dirty (even though it appeared clean) versus the silky smooth clean taste (or lack thereof) of my EHM alkaline filtered water. Lately, I've primarily mixed flavor supplements or squeezed lemon into my water to make it palatable. Now I will be able to enjoy drinking water straight from my EHM alkaline pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few days then clogged
customer_reviews.text: The filter worked great for the first few days. Water tasted great and was really happy with it. Now the water doesnt filter at all and gets stuck in the fill chamber. Im probably going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: hai nguyen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTE, EXCELLENT RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the pitcher because I wanted to lower my body's acidity. After I figured out how to properly place the filter and began using the system, I found it a refreshing change from the water our home filtration system delivers. The water tastes great and the pitcher is easy to use. I recommend the pitcher to anyone who wants to drink better tasting water that is also great for your body. My acidity has decreased since I started drinking this water. (I have also changed my diet to be less acidic).
customer_reviews.author: leslie klein

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN FRESH WATER PITCHER
customer_reviews.text: I've used this pitcher for 1 month. The filtered water is very good. Friends who have tried it remark that the water is clean without chloride or other tastes. I gave it 4 stars because the container is a little flimsy. To prevent the filter from clogging, the fill section should not be refilled until the pitcher is empty, and the whole pitcher vigorously shaken before refilling. I think the filter is very effective and provides the cleanest water I've tasted. Certainly better than other brands & bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: yoda

customer_reviews.title: A necessary home product
customer_reviews.text: I have a well and my water taste good and appears clear. However, I like using a filtering system vs the one in my refrigerator. I have used another brand of filtering pitcher for several years. When it was time to again order new filters, I decided to try a new brand. I received this one 2 days ago and set it up right away based on instructions. This was easy to do. Today, I am enjoying the clear water for coffee, cooking, and drinking water for my entire family, and so far the taste is good and the pitcher works well. I have no negative issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The only thing positive was that it was easy to assemble. The workmanship was poorly made. I have had this product going on 2 months and the top keeps popping off, keeps falling off when you pour to your glass, keeps falling off. I have had a lot of issues with quality of this product. I rarely write reviews but the quality is this product for the price was disturbing and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great now that we were sent a new lid from the company!
customer_reviews.text: When the item first arrived I was very close to immediately returning. The lid would not stay on at all & would create a mess when trying to pour water unless you had a free hand to hold the lid on. I called the company and they tried to walk me through how to properly install the lid, none of which helped (I was installing it correctly, our lid was simply defective). They sent me a new lid which works much much better. Now that the lid problem is resolved, we're very happy with the water filter system. It makes tap water much more drinkable.
customer_reviews.author: SheenaS

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this alkaline water pitcher! NICE size for the fridge shelf. Handle comfortable for lifting to pour and ease of putting back into fridge. LOVE that the top opens to refill without having to lift entire top off. When pouring, only filtered portion of water pours. The taste is so smooth. We have used another brand of pitcher sold on Amazon and find this a Five Star PERFORMER! The filter installs effortlessly! Thank you for a GREAT accessory to good health :) !!
customer_reviews.author: Sandytoes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have decent well water at my house but have had better. I wanted to try this filter to see if it could make any difference and it really does! I like the filtered water much better for drinking. I continued to use the filter for too long as it has become the same flavor as the tap water but the water still filtered fine. Other reviews said the filter would start to slow down so I figured that would happen to me too but never did. I will be replacing the filter every couple months from now on to keep the great water coming.
customer_reviews.author: K R

customer_reviews.title: Love the water and benefits
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher would be a 5 star if the lid was not so crappy. The water quality is great, but, you have to hold the lid on every time you pour. I have watched the videos and read the instructions of how the lid attaches to the water reservoir insert but it does not work at all. They need a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Lmdavis07

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, filter can be a pain as it seems to clog up after just a few uses and the lid like many have said can pop off if not secured properly which is more of a pain than it should be. We stopped using after a while as the improvements to the water quality where just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic filtering solution
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to get alkalines added to our water as well as filter out the chlorine and other chemicals in our city water. The pitcher was easy to use and the lid works great for pouring whether the reservoir is full or not. The difference in the taste and quality is very noticeable and we are very happy with our purchase. I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking for an easy way to add alkaline water into their diet without purchasing constant supplies of bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful way to enjoy the benefit of high PH water while away from home!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful way to enjoy the benefit of high PH 'little water' while away from home. We have a Kangen water system at home and my husband swears he feels a difference when he doesn't have access to the water. This is a great option while away from home for an extended period. Easy to use and we are getting 9.8+ when testing the water so far. We are making sure the water level doesn't go below the bottom of the filter as recommended by others. Love it! Leslee G
customer_reviews.author: LLG

customer_reviews.title: My water tastes much better!
customer_reviews.text: In the area I live the water is very hard. I have purchased water over drinking it out of the faucet for years! The tap water is tasting so much better... my husband loves it but I still have reservations about the EHM Alkaline water pitcher taste. I find the water to leave a very distinct baking soda flavor in my mouth and nostrils. Hopefully it will dissipate as the filter gets older. I can now use my tap water to make tea, coffee & juice drinks though and the baking soda flavor is not present if I add something to it. My husband loves it but I'm still on the shelf about the filtration.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S Bean

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this along with test strips. My RO (reverse osmosis) water started at a 7 and was still a 7 after running through the pitcher. My tap water began as a 7 and was maybe a 7.5 after running through the pitcher. I called the company. I thought maybe they would say something like I must have a faulty filter, let us send a new one. No, I was told this doesn't work for RO water, and test strips are not accurate. They said they would send an email to explain why, but I never received anything. I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Higer PH Levels And Great Tasting Water.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The water is refreshing and the filter keeps the water at a higher PH level. I have seen some complaints about the filter sometimes not flowing properly. I have had this issue and to me it seems that tiny air bubbles are getting into the filter. I just gently tap the bottom of the pitcher and I see small bubbles come out of the bottom of the filter and the water starts to flow properly. I will continue to use this pitcher because of the higher PH levels in the water and the great taste of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Water
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I replaced my Brita water pitcher with the EHM Alkaline Pitcher and not only does the water taste so much better but I know it is giving me all the benefits of alkaline water. I used to purchase alkaline water by the gallon at my water store but this is much easier and more cost efficient. I followed instructions and have had no problems with the lid popping off.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Our family made a decision to drink more alkaline water, but the drawback was the price. After researching many different products, I bought this pitcher. I had my doubts, but it turned out to be a great investment. The water tastes smooth. My kids couldnt tell the difference between the water from the pitcher and their favorite bottled alkeline water. Only thing that you need to watch for is securing the lid correctly. If you don't, it will come off while pouring.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.612

customer_reviews.title: This pitcher is GOLD!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been spending 4 dollars a day on gallons of alkaline water. Until I came across this. I was skeptical at first but a friend of mine tested the ph levels with the kit and it consistently hit between high 8s and high 9s I wish I would’ve found this item months ago when I made the transition to alkaline water. Forever a customer thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Easily on my top 5 kitchen gadget list
customer_reviews.text: This product just made it on my very short “can’t live without” list. It is easy to assemble, easy to use and water tastes great. I bought it because it takes forever filling up a 40oz water bottle from my fridge. This pitcher made everything faster. I just leave it on counter. Refill it when it’s low and then come back for more water later. Definitely made me drink more. When we go on overnight trips I make it a point to bring this so I don’t have to spend money buying bottled water which saves me money and saves the environment from another plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been researching the benefits of drinking alkaline water and have been buying plastic bottles of alkaline water at Whole Foods for years. I decided to stop the plastic bottle fiasco (terrible for environment) and after searching for weeks I purchased the Ehm water pitcher. So far so good. I’m happy with the flavor of the water and the ease and convenience of always having water available. Hooray, no more trips to Whole Foods for water. I do transfer the water to a glass bottle for drinking.
customer_reviews.author: elaine damon

customer_reviews.title: "Alkaline water is best for cancer and it would be good for you ...
customer_reviews.text: At the recommendation of a friend of mine who is a dentist, I purchased this pitcher for my dog who has cancer. My friend and his entire family have these and I have to say, this pitcher is fabulous. The quality is very nice, it's easy to assemble and fill and I can certainly tell a big difference in the water both from bottled and tap. It's refreshing. I'm very happy that I made this purchase. MC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like drinking water but this picture with the alkaline water filter changed all of that. The first think I do when I get up is drink water now. customer_reviews.author: Sure-Way M.B. Church

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and no more purchased bottled water!

customer_reviews.title: Just got mine!!!!

After tasting the alkaline water from my new EHM water pitcher it tasted great! I will now not be using my bottled water deliveries and cutting down another bill!
customer_reviews.author: Loredana Nardone

customer_reviews.title: Good filter

It does filter sloely and you can't fit much in the tank but it's not as bad as some of these reviews say. Also, no leaks! Overall I am happy with my purchase

customer_reviews.title: Odd taste and water runs through edges of filter
customer_reviews.text: I did use ph testing drops on the water that went through the filter and this does work in increasing the ph, however, the resulting water does have a unique taste to it that I do not enjoy. I have also noticed that one area of the filter allows water to run right through while the rest of the water drips. So becuse if that I do not believe this product works as well as it should and not all of the water running through gets filtered. I find myself not using this very often because of the taste that I cannot get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious water that filters fast!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher looks and fills like a Brita, only much faster and a whole lot healthier! I had purchased another alkaline water pitcher and it took forever to actually fill, and after it did, it emptied so fast, I found myself refilling it a few times a day. That’s when I purchased this filter, based on the reviews and I am so happy I did! It works great! After doing extensive research on the benefits of alkaline water, I’m so excited to have this pitcher to add to the quality of my water... and my life.

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes better but is slower to filter. It's worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Benefits

customer_reviews.title: Easy, affordable way to support your best health
customer_reviews.text: I have not been in the market for a water filter for nine years. Well, I was delighted to find the EHM Ultra Premium Alkaline water pitcher at a super reasonable price. After filtering tap water, I tested the alkalinity with my pH strip. Sure enough, the strip showed dark green, or highly alkaline. I'm delighted to know that every day my health is supported by the water I drink.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Water, Helped with GERD relief!

The filtration process is suspiciously fast, not sure if it's because the filter was broken or? The pitcher is otherwise a sturdy plastic material. Water tastes ok

Completely recommend this and worth the premium price on it.

It fits snug if you snap it in with the reservoir in the correct position. No more issues after that. Just great tasting water!

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with ease of use and end result!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the EHM Alkaline Water Pitcher because it is a much better vaue than purchasing alkaline water. My pitcher is brand new I just bought it so it's not clogged like I have been using it for a while. I would never recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping and works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Received my pitcher fast! Easy to get ready for use and easy to use. The water tastes great. I quit the distilled water when I received my pitcher and I feel better already. The daily distilled water seemed to be a little harsh on the tummy. It filters quickly. The instructions say to fill at night, put in the refrigerator and then empty the next morning. I have been doing just that. I fill it up to where the bottom of the pitcher is full and the water in the reservoir just covers the filter. I have had the pitcher for a week and I have no issues here.
customer_reviews.author: Jdp

customer_reviews.title: Not a full pitcher of water
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product and assembles easy. However, we didn't realize at first that it's not meant to be completely full to the top and pour without leaking. So, in order to pour the filtered water you fill it up once and let filter through to the bottom section. Unfortunately this means you will be refilling it a lot unless you want it to leak or have the lid fall off. Otherwise, it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Passaris

customer_reviews.title: Game changing product at a competitive price
customer_reviews.text: This filter does exactly what it was advertised to do. It turns tap water into fresh mineralized alkaline water. I didn't think was possible with a pitcher filter. The set up instructions are clear and it seems like they fixed the issues that people had with the product in older reviews, like the lid not fitting/coming loose. We'll see if it stands the test of time. I'll report back.

I’m looking forward to drinking many gallons of good alkaline pH water now.
